effect.Name: Multiplication With Power
effect.description: Multiplication With Power - Shader multiplies colors of base and blend with each other then colors are calculated by power
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Multiplication With Power (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader multiplies colors of base and blend with each other then colors are calculated by power

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility

parameter.name: Power
parameter.description: This variable sets the color power
